title: The Best Memorial Day Sales & Deals To Shop Now
description: Memorial Day weekend is finally here, and so are the sales. Many of our favorite brands and retailers have launched their MDW deals, and we’ve done the digging so you can shop effortlessly. If you’re in the market for big-ticket items like designer fashion, luxury beauty, and top-rated mattresses, or want to stock up on everyday products, now’s the time to make those purchases for less (and enjoy the long weekend relaxing instead of scrolling).Read on for your one-stop guide to every worthwhile discount code and markdown from brands from Lululemon and Nordstrom to Coach Outlet, and many more. So fill your virtual cart with summer staples while they’re at their lowest. DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Memorial Day Sale Quick Links Abercrombie & Fitch: 25% off everything with code AFSUMMERAdidas: 30% off full-price and sale styles with code SAVEAnn Taylor: 40% off select styles, plus an extra 15% off your purchase Anthropologie: Extra 40% off sale styles Aritzia: Between 30% and 50% off select stylesAsos: 20% off sitewideAvocado: Up to 20% off organic mattressesAway: How about some more R29 goodness, right here?What We Are Buying From Memorial Day SalesSnag-worthy Coach Outlet Memorial Day Sale Picks18 Memorial Day Mattress Sales On Our Radar
author: Alexandra Polk
excerpt: Here are the best deals to shop ahead of Memorial Day and over the long weekend, from fashion and beauty sales to home and sex toy discounts.
text: All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. html:
All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

Photo: Courtesy of J.Crew.

Memorial Day weekend is finally here, and so are the sales. Many of our favorite brands and retailers have launched their MDW deals, and we’ve done the digging so you can shop effortlessly. If you’re in the market for big-ticket items like designer fashion, luxury beauty, and top-rated mattresses, or want to stock up on everyday products, now’s the time to make those purchases for less (and enjoy the long weekend relaxing instead of scrolling).

Read on for your one-stop guide to every worthwhile discount code and markdown from brands from Lululemon and Nordstrom to Coach Outlet, and many more. So fill your virtual cart with summer staples while they’re at their lowest.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Best Memorial Day Sale Quick Links

Abercrombie & Fitch: 25% off everything with code AFSUMMER
Adidas: 30% off full-price and sale styles with code SAVE
Ann Taylor: 40% off select styles, plus an extra 15% off your purchase
Anthropologie: Extra 40% off sale styles 
Aritzia: Between 30% and 50% off select styles
Asos: 20% off sitewide
Avocado: Up to 20% off organic mattresses
Away: Up to 20% off select luggage
Awe Inspired: 30% off sitewide
Baublebar: Extra 20% off sale styles
Bellesa: Shop daily sales for up to 60% off, and get free toys on $129+ orders with code MM5 
Beyond Yoga: Up to 75% off all sale styles
Bloomingdale’s: Between 25% and 65% off select styles
Boll & Branch: 20% off $200+ orders on bundles and summer essentials
Brooklinen: 25% off sitewide, plus 50% off bundles 
Buffalo Jeans: Up to 50% off sitewide 
Calpak: 15% off sitewide, and up to 60% off select styles
Calzedonia: Shop select $69 bikini sets and one-pieces, and 50% off select spring/summer collection styles
Castlery: Save up to $500 sitewide and up to 40% off sale picks
Coach: Shop select sale styles
Coach Outlet: Extra 20% off select styles
Cole Haan: 50% off select styles, plus an extra 20% off $175+ purchases with code SUMMER
Cozy Earth: Up to 35% off sitewide with exclusive code REFINERY29
Cupshe: Between 10% and 20% off the more you buy
Dagne Dover: 20% off all purchases, 25% off $200+ purchases, and 30% off $350+ purchases
Dolce Vita: Extra 30% off sale styles with code SUMMER 
Dr. Scholl’s Shoes: Up to 50% off, plus free shipping
DSW: VIP members get an extra 25% off select shoes with code VIPSPECIAL

Eos: 20% off sitewide on $45+ orders

Everlane: 25% off sitewide
Farmacy Beauty: 20% off sitewide 
Frame: Extra 30% off sale styles

Gymshark: Extra 30% off last-chance looks with code EXTRA30

The North Face: Up to 25% off select styles
Thinx: 20% off sitewide 
Torrid: 50% off full price styles, plus an extra 60% off clearance
True Botanicals: Free full-size Body Butter with $150+ orders
Ulta: BOGO 50% off mix and match suncare, up to 40% off select beauty, and up to $20 off prestige brands and fragrances 
Uniqlo: Deals starting at $9.90, plus get a free reusable bottle with $99+ orders
Vera Bradley: Up to 50% off almost everything including sale, plus 30% off new arrivals

Womanizer: Up to 50% off and get a free toy on $199+ orders 
YSE Beauty: 20% off sitewide (with some exclusions)
Youth To The People: 25% off sitewide, plus get a free sunscreen with $85+ orders
